暒字的基本解释

暒
qíng
古同“晴”。

暒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］
［《廣韻》疾盈切，平清，從。］
“夝1”的今字。亦作“暒1”。
(1)雨雪等停止，天空无云或少云。
(2)比喻泪干或泪止。

暒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页498第14
【集韻】慈盈切，音情。晴或作暒。詳晴字註。又新佞切，音醒。義同。

暒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
暒字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
qíng
Gu Tong is "sunny".
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］
["Guangyun" surging sharply, calm and clear, from. ]
The present character of "夝1". Also known as "暒1".
(1) The rain and snow stop, and the sky is cloudless or less clouded.
(2) It is a metaphor for tears to dry or to stop.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　暒; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 498 14
[Jiyun] Compassionately cut, sound and emotional. Sunny or unreliable. Detailed note of clear words. Newly cut again, the sound is awakened. The same meaning.
